rooms.description: A spacious entrance with north-facing entry, designed for welcoming guests and adhering to Vastu principles. Minimalist design with natural light enhancements.
Open-plan living area integrated with dining space, featuring a modern aesthetic and flexible seating arrangements, large windows for ventilation and natural light.

Modern open-plan kitchen that connects seamlessly with the living area. Equipped with efficient cabinetry, energy-efficient appliances, and ample counter space. Design emphasizes functionality on a tight budget.
Compact, functional bathroom designed for ground floor utility. Adheres to local building norms ensuring water safety and ventilation.

openings.description: Large north-facing windows installed in the living area to maximize natural light, following Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.
Main door oriented towards the north, complemented by sliding glass doors leading to a small garden or courtyard, enhancing ventilation and natural lighting.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom. Features ample storage and minimalistic decor to maintain a modern look while keeping costs low.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy, with sufficient natural light through strategically placed windows.
Compact bedroom offering essential amenities and flexible layout options within a tight budget.

Dedicated library space with built-in bookshelves, comfortable seating and soft lighting to create an ideal environment for reading and study. The design adheres to Vastu principles by situating it in the north-west corner if possible.
Small balcony adjacent to one of the bedrooms for a private outdoor space, ensuring natural ventilation as per local building norms.

openings.description: North-facing windows in the master bedroom ensure an abundance of natural light and adhere to Vastu recommendations for a peaceful sleep environment.
Small ventilation openings integrated into the library space ensuring fresh air circulation without compromising privacy.

budget_notes.general_overview: Design focuses on essential modern amenities and functional spaces while remaining within a tight budget. Materials are chosen for cost-effectiveness, durability, and alignment with local building norms.
budget_notes.vastu_considerations: The north-facing entrance ensures positive energy flow according to Vastu principles; the layout has been designed to optimize natural light and ventilation throughout the house.
